meanings.def: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount
examples: By my calculation(s), we made a profit of £20 000 last year.
Our guess was confirmed by calculation.
If your calculations are correct, then we will make a large profit.
It turned out that our calculations were incorrect.
She did a rapid calculation in her head.
The calculations are based on average annual data.
We cannot make a precise calculation of the price until we have all the costs.
an exact calculation of the amount spent so far

meanings.def: the process of using your judgement to decide what the results would be of doing something
examples: Decisions are shaped by political calculations.

meanings.def: careful planning for yourself without caring about other people
